answers.answer: I'm certainly no expert, and her doctor should be able to tell her why they're checking.I have read, though, that elevated HCG levels in the third trimester can be linked to preeclampsia.She really should ask her doc to be sure.  *well wishes to you and your daughter*

I wish I had an answer for that. I myself having trouble trying to find answers about my high HCG numbers. I ovulated around 24th of June and beta numbers came back on the 5th was 1701 and on July 7th 3711. Looking for answers. I do have an U/S scheduled for the 26th.PB

question: My daughter is in her third trimester of pregnancy and has to go for weekly testing due to an elevated HCG - can you please explain what causes that and what concerns I should havethank you.
title: Elevated HCG
